/**
 * # configureStore.js
 */import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import logger from"redux-logger";//added just to show state logs
import thunk from"redux-thunk";//added thunk for async tasks
import reducer from"../reducers";var createStoreWithMiddleware=applyMiddleware(logger,thunk)(createStore);/**
 * ## configureStore
 * @param {Object} the state with for keys:
 * contact etc..
 *
 */export default function configureStore(initialState){return createStoreWithMiddleware(reducer,initialState);}
